TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationServicesHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 관리되는 호스팅 환경에서 인증 서비스, 역할 서비스 및 프로필 서비스의 인스턴스를 만드는 팩터리 클래스를 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides a factory class that creates instances of the authentication service, role service, and profile service in managed hosting environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 팩터리 클래스의 인스턴스를 만드는 방법을 제공 합니다 , , 및 클래스입니다.This factory class provides a way to create instances of the , , and classes. 이 팩터리 클래스를 사용 하려면 WCF 서비스 (.svc) 파일을 만들고 지정 에 `ServiceHosting` 특성을 `@ ServiceHost` 지시문입니다.To use this factory class, create a WCF Service (.svc) file and specify in the `ServiceHosting` attribute of the `@ ServiceHost` directive. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 지정 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 에 `@ ServiceHost` 인증 서비스를 구성 하려면.svc 파일의 지시문입니다.The following example shows how to specify in the `@ ServiceHost` directive of a .svc file to configure the authentication service. ```csharp <%@ ServiceHost Language="C#" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ``` ```vb <%@ ServiceHost Language="VB" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

span.span: The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.

summary.span: 기본 주소가 지정된 서비스 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

span.span: Creates an instance of the service class that has the specified base address or addresses.

returns.span: 기본 주소가 지정된 서비스 형식에 대한 인스턴스입니다.

span.span: A instance for the type of service that has the specified base address or addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 일반적으로이 메서드는 자동으로 Windows Communication Foundation 서비스 활성화의 일부로 및 수동으로 호출할 필요가 없습니다.Usually this method is called automatically by Windows Communication Foundation as part of service activation, and you do not have to call the method manually.
